import axios from"axios";import jwt_decode from"jwt-decode";var api="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API,"/users");export function checkUser(userToCheck){return axios.post("http://localhost:10000/api/login",userToCheck);}////no need for Authorization
export function addUser(newUser){return axios.post("http://localhost:10000/api/register",newUser);}export function updateUser(_id,updatedUser){return axios.put("".concat(api,"/").concat(_id),updatedUser,{headers:{Authorization:JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("token")).token}});}export function getUserById(_id){return axios.get("".concat(api,"/").concat(_id),{headers:{Authorization:JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("token")).token}});}export function getUsers(){return axios.get(api,{headers:{Authorization:JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("token")).token}});}export function deleteUser(_id){return axios.delete("".concat(api,"/").concat(_id),{headers:{Authorization:JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("token")).token}});}export function getTokenDetails(){var token=JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("token")).token;return jwt_decode(token);}
